description: Attributes for Google Cloud client libraries.

gcp.client.service.description: Identifies the Google Cloud service for which the official client library is intended.
gcp.client.service.note: Intended to be a stable identifier for Google Cloud client libraries that is uniform across implementation languages. The value should be derived from the canonical service domain for the service; for example, 'foo.googleapis.com' should result in a value of 'foo'.
